Notification Preferences ‚Äã

yaml
# Per-user configuration
notifications:
  email:
    enabled: true
    events:
      - deployment.success
      - deployment.failed
  slack:
    enabled: true
    webhook: https://hooks.slack.com/...
    events:
      - deployment.failed
      - system.alert
